title: Worst airline ever
text: We had to fly on June 3rd We bought a ticket 2 weeks before we fly from Milan bergamo to Tirana Albania ,4 days before the day we fly we received an email from the company saying they're sorry but the flight is cancelled...... seemed like there were never going to be a flight but they make people buy tickets anyway...... they then ask you to keep the credit in your wizzair account to use it for future flights. Soooo it's a trick and a trap to keep your money..... to call them from Where we lived cost so much..... so this airline loses some customers......for future flights....... no matter how cheap they are in the future I will never ever buy another ticket from wizz air....... the only time ..the most crucial time in my life that I needed them ...they disappointed and made me angry..... not because a flight just got canceled.... but because they tricked their customers into buying a fake ticket that would never take place...... I guess it worked this time.... but never again.....

title: Excellent fish
text: Loved the fish so much at this beautiful restaurant so much ,we shared the seafood platter and was huge . I recomend it to anyone that loves seafood.

title: Nice restaurant
text: A very beautiful restaurant with a breathtaking view ,food was the best we had in Croatia. The waitresses were very nice and very professional.

title: The best ice cream
text: Well the ice cream here is unbelievably good,we went there twice in one day .It is located in the middle of many restaurants on that stretch,great location.

title: Great hospitality!!!
text: A big thanks to the front man standing outside greeting people he made our Hard Rock Cafe experience even more special.we had lunch and returned in the evening for drinks . Many tavernas around the area do not serve coctails or I should say not like the HRC does em. We will be returning again in our next trip in Athens.

title: Wonderful mezes
text: The Greek mezes were very good , we had a variety with rake and only cost us 15 euros.staff was polite.

title: Awful area
text: This is an awful area , I have never seen so much police in any other area in Athens ,instead of this craziness should have been the opposite because of the police.

title: Fresh fish
text: We shared a seafood platter and Greek salad 2 beers all just under 40 euros , the owners brought us desert on the house. A very enjoyable experience for anyone who like Greek hospitality.

title: Busy area
text: If you're looking for a really busy area with many cafes and restaurants this will make you very happy walking around.

title: Plaka
text: A place you should visit while walking around the City, many historical sites and restaurants souvenir shops.

title: Nice pastry
text: We had the chocolate cake and the cheesecake both very fresh , the place looked clean and neat,I'd go back again.

title: Cool bar
text: We went to six dogs on a recommendation from a waiter working in a restaurant,the staff was very friendly the drinks were strong. Good atmosphere down the stairs looking like a yard .

title: Snack and beer
text: This was right next to our hotel,my friend wanted a beer so we sat to get a snack as well , I recommend it.

title: Cheap and excellent
text: We found this cafe randomly walking around city center they really made us the best ice coffee ever.

title: Beautiful view
text: The view from the hotel a for Athens was very beautiful the drinks were strong the staff was a little old school , maybe the bar needs a little more variety of international workers too.

title: Should be more
text: The only thing that disappoints me was the opening hours , it was a little frustrating with the cars driving by.

title: Filopapous
text: This was a cool area to walk around they had such nice pathways into the woods and little churches on the way it was a cool walk I recommend for a afternoon walk.

title: Whole Chicken
text: We took away a whole chicken and salad and shared them in our room the chicken spices were so good the salad tasted fresh .

title: My fav area
text: This was by far my favorite area to walk around in the center of Stockholm, the narrow streets in the old town area and tourist shops were so relaxing to walk around.

title: Awesome pizza
text: We were in Stockholm for 4 days we ate 3 times here because the pizza was so good , I recommend it !!!

title: It was okay
text: This wasn't bad just a normal burger and fries , service was very polite and very helpful with our questions.

title: Nice snack place
text: This was a very nice snack place ,we didn't have time to sit and eat a proper lunch so we stopped at uncle Norms and liked it.

title: Get the best juice here
text: Since I love fruits I always look out for fruit juices wherever I travel , it was really cheap compared to what I paid back home and tastes so much fresher.

title: Beautiful beach
text: Beautiful beach but the only thing we disliked was the plastic so it would be better if they cleaned that up. It's nice to have drinks though

title: Cool cafe
text: Very cool cafe in a very busy street they had many snacks to munch on . The local beer was so good too bad I don't remember the name of it.

title: Nice spring rolls
text: Loved the spring rolls very much the ribs were very tasty the workers seemed really happy to be there and serve.

title: Wonderful
text: This was a wonderful restaurant with many Varieties of foods , the staff were sooo polite and helpful. I highly recommend this restaurant.

title: Dude is that a pub?
text: Yes this was a cool name pub dude that's why we entered in the beginning but it was so nice atmosphere.

title: I SCREAM
text: I loved this little ice cream shop , they had such a big variety and the staff were so nice to us we went there almost everyday.

title: If you're a vegetarian
text: If you're a vegetarian then try indo kitchen they had different options ,one of my friends is vegetarian and she loved it too!

title: Yeap
text: The coffee and the deserts were very good the coffee here tasted a little different but good so I recommend.

title: Fresh juice
text: It was a nice fruit juice place in a long day walking around that's what we needed so it's very smart location.

title: Waste of time
text: We had no choice but eat here we kind of knew that the place didn't look like the place to have fresh seafood but we gave it a try anyway, disappointed.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful experience in a historical place, the views were astonishing the climbing was a little slippery but nth bad.

title: Very good restaurant
text: The restaurant served good food the staff was very polite,our waitress helped us with the ordering and we were happy customers .

title: The best breakfast place
text: Loved the waffle with ice cream and omelette with cheese this is the perfect place to start your day with the best breakfast.

title: Love Pescadito
text: Loved pescadito so much we were there for a birthday dinner the dj was awesome the food was beyond perfection!!!!

title: Polite staff
text: The staff at this 7-eleven make a big difference and I see why it was so busy people nowadays need also a little politeness doesn't take much .keep up with the good work everyone.

title: The best hot wings
text: The wing stop was our favorite hot wing place in Massachusetts mmm so tasty . Try this place you won't be disappointed,I highly recommend.

title: Good pizza
text: This Pizza Hut was better than the one in Greece , The staff were very friendly and we were told about the specials. I'd go back again .

title: The truth of this restaurant.
text:
When it first started I was very pleased to eat here because the food was very good and the price was lower than now. After a while I found out from the employees that they had changed the Chef which is why I saw a big difference in the taste of the food . Seems like it's getting worse , I would say to the management to take a good look at the restaurant section and try every dish ... if they find nothing wrong with the food then they need to look for a new job.
The way they present it actually looks nice but when you bite in the chicken then it's dry. Staff are really really nice and try so hard to please everyone.

title: Max was our guy that night.
text: We went back at night because of Max ,he was very friendly and very funny he also had been in South Africa and had a lot in common . Food was good atmosphere was very cozy .

title: Not bad
text: It's a little overrated food was okay but that's about it ,looked really nice inside the atmosphere was relaxing. Ravioli was good , risotto was okay, a little more expensive than other restaurants around the area for the same quality.

title: Other best tour guide in Athens
text: We loved Dimitris , he was very good at explaining everything in details . Very friendly and very professional staff.
place: Russian Guide in Athens - Ioannis Dalianidis

title: Average
text: It seemed like this cafe wasn't trying too hard to win their customers,no smiles and no good customer service.

title: Good restaurant
text: It's a good restaurant I wouldn't say it's anything special, the staff were very polite and very friendly. The variety of meats was good the location wasn't as good.

title: Good experience
text: The staff were so nice there that we went back the next day, food was delicious but staff made a difference.

title: So so
text: The food was okay but nothing to tell back home about it, coffee was better service was nice overall not bad

title: Good pizza
text: Good pizza but over priced for the quantity they give , the portion should be bigger ... pizza was good.

title: Very expensive
text: Very expensive and no way of telling the line of who is last and who is first to order,I wouldn't go back.

title: Overrated
text: What I thought about this coffee shop was that it was very expensive for the quality they offer!!!!!

title: Waiter was very rude.
text: I don't understand why in Athens the restaurants and cafes still hire old school waiters.... ordered our drinks then when waiter brings them over he asks to get paid because his shift was over . Weird because when we paid him he put the money in his pocket and never left. We never got a receipt he just verbally said the amount. What made it worse was that he kept his eyes on our table.... wasn't sure if his goal was to make us leave soon or? We thought he pocketed the money without the boss knowing about it. So one advice to the manager of this cafe.... we loved your cafe but you have to hire the right staff to do the job.

title: Average
text: A average food and average service, this restaurant could do a lot better if the management put hands on it. It's a golden location.

title: Beautiful museum
text: We thought this museum was very smart built up , the architecture had a meaning and the cafe on the top was a smart move.

title: Good hotel
text: It's a good hotel in the middle of all the historic ruins and sights to see , so location is the best in the area . Good clean sheets no acropolis view but still we liked it . I would go back and stay there if I was back in Athens.

title: Fresh fish
text: Dinner was served on a timely basis and the waiters cleaned our fish since we both weren't so good at cleaning fish bones.

title: Good pizza
text: We loved the pizzeria because their cheese was the best cheese on a pizza we ever had in our entire life .

title: Good coffee
text: The coffee we had we both enjoyed this cafe makes a difference because of their fast service and staff.

title: Nice
text: Had a beer at this place the staff were very friendly and very welcoming,I'd go back again. Keep up with the nice smiles everyone.

title: The best steak in Naples
text: We had a great experience at Dambo ,service was so friendly and so helpful. The steak I had was the best I've ever tried. I will be back again in the future.

title: This cafe is so cool
text: This cafe was so cool we liked how the sitting outdoors and the beautiful weather really makes people happy,now I understand why people are happy in Greece.

title: The best pinearli
text: Loved the penirli the owner himself makes it homemade . We were greeted by the owner himself and explained how he actually cooks everything himself. Recommended for something quick on the go.

title: It's in a small square
text: We found this little gem by luck walking back to our hotel , we were a little hungry and walked right at the first food place we saw. They had so many options to eat and good keftades.

title: Very cool bar
text: We had so much wine at this beautiful bar , the staff gave us free shots . The place has got so much positive energy,we will be back.

title: Loved it
text: Loved the wraps even though I love meat this vegetarian wrap was so tasty . I'd go back again to eat there.

title: Great pizza
text: Enjoyed a great pizza even though they had a good variety of different foods. The taco was delicious.

title: Nice cocktails
text: Enjoyed the coctAils very much, the sitting is so nicely decorated the view of the palms are so relaxing.

title: Enjoy
text: Nice cafe to enjoy the peace and quiet,staff get out of their way just to make sure you're enjoying the coffee.

title: Good lunch
text: Very good lunch in a small place if you're looking for something quick and tasty this is the place !!

title: Very romantic
text: This was a very romantic place and a very beautiful atmosphere,staff was so friendly the drinks were strong and loved the stay there.

title: Good food
text: Good steak in a busy area of other restaurants the food was good but a little expensive compared to other restaurants at the same level.

title: A very nice restaurant
text: Loved Argentina grill the steak was very good the atmosphere was beautiful the only downside was the waiter that was too serious. I recommend.
